title: WTB Mickey Doolan batting for back run

posts.post_title: WTB Mickey Doolan batting for back run
posts.post_content:
I’m looking to buy/trade for T206 Doolan batting for a back run. If you have any for sale or trade, please let me know! 

Thank you!

Hey Mook!

This is a long shot, but i've got your two toughies, Broadleaf and Cycle.  PM me your email address.  They are in my T206 back set and I have no interest in selling, but may consider a trade for like kind backs/similar value with other players.  LMK...  Cliff
